vodka.title: Vodka Mixed Drinks
vodka.note: Price includes a mixer of tonic, coke soda, coke zero, or sprite.

gin.title: Gin Mixed Drinks
gin.note: Served with Schweppes tonic water, over flaked ice, and garnished with delicious Amalfi Coast Lemon.
